Summary: Orange-Red lights to the east fading in color from orange to red heading west.
divs: sighting detailsi seen some lights rise above the treeline to the east of my house. the lights were initially orange and i assumed they were fireworks, that was until they started heading my way and more of them appeared. as they got above me they 1 by 1 disappeared. the lights started orange and turned red. at one point i seen 3 of them form a triangle so i though for a seccond maybe this is military or some type of test rocket, i stopped to listen and heard nothing! i ran inside to find camera and naturally the battery was dead. i rushed back outside to see the last few lights head my direction and fade overhead. less than 5 minutes later there were atleaste 3 airplanes flying over head in the same direction. these lights moved slowly, did not move in 90 degree angles but did display formation\color changes and all disappeared at roughly the same location.
